title: Middlekauff: NFL coaching hire rundown; Divisional Round Playoff preview; Kyler Murray NFL QB evaluation
itunes:title: Middlekauff: NFL coaching hire rundown; Divisional Round Playoff preview; Kyler Murray NFL QB evaluation
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 

In this episode, Middlekauff runs down the flurry of young NFL head coach hirings, explains why Arians and Fangio's experience is underrated, previews the Divisional Round Playoff games, evaluates Kyler Murray as an NFL QB prospect, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
